trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The BuildEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: A classe BuildEventArgs é uma classe base abstrata para todos os <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>classes de argumento de evento.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação do <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>construtor sem parâmetros e define o <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A>propriedade <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>e o <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A>propriedade para o thread atual.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> classe com especificado <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>valores.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
trans-unit.target: O texto do evento.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave ajuda associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
trans-unit.target: O texto do evento.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave ajuda associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The date and time to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: A data e hora para associar o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações contextuais local.

trans-unit.source: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
trans-unit.target: Isso está anexado ao log de eventos para definir onde estão localizados em relação o processo, mecanismo, projeto, destino ou tarefas que está executando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> object representing the location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"> </xref> objeto que representa as informações contextuais local.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help keyword for the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a palavra-chave de ajuda para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword for the event.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave ajuda para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the message for the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a mensagem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The message for the event.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref:System.Object>gera o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref:System.Object>gera o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um identificador de inteiro para o thread que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de inteiro para o thread que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora em que o evento foi gerado como <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que o evento foi gerado como <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>
